DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 , two-arm , non-randomized , open-label , multicenter study evaluate safety efficacy 2 VELCADE-containing regimen . Patients treat either combination VELCADE , rituximab , cyclophosphamide , doxorubicin , prednisone ( VELCADE-R-CAP ) combination VELCADE , rituximab , cyclophosphamide , prednisone ( VELCADE-R-CP ) base investigator preference . Following completion treatment period , patient receive maintenance therapy rituximab maximum 2 year .
